Producer configuration

PropertyRequiredDescriptionDefault value
publisher.classnameOptionalThe name of concrete pubisher classcom.inmobi.messaging.netty.ScribeMessagePublisher
statemitter.filenameOptionalThe configuration file name of the stat emitter. If no value is passed for this  
configuration stat emitter will be disabled.		-
scribe.hostOptionalThe host on which collector is runninglocalhost
scribe.portOptionalThe port on which collector is running1111
scribe.backoffSecondsOptionalThe backoff time in seconds to reconnecting whenever there is exception5
scribe.timeoutSecondsOptionalThe read timeout for ReadTimeoutHandler5
scribe.message.queuesizeOptionalThe size of the to-be-sent message queue for the publisher. If more messages needs to  
be buffered, the later messages will be dropped.		50000
scribe.ack.queuesizeOptionalThe size of the ack queue for the publisher. If no ack comes from scribe for the  
messages in ack queue, the messages wont be sent and will be buffered in to-be-sent queue.		1000
scribe.enable.retriesOptionalWhether to resend a message if ack is try_later. If true, message will be resend.  
Otherwise, will be counted as gracefulTerminates.		true
scribe.resend.ackLostOptionalWhether to resend a message if ack is lost. If true, the message will be re-queued for  
sending, otherwise, it willbe counted as gracefulTerminates and dropped.		true
scribe.numdrains.oncloseOptionalThe number of times the publisher has to try draining the messages during close.  
If value is -1, the publisher will try to drain all the messages in sent and ack queue  
indefinitely. Otherwise, it will try for the specified number of times and drop the  
messages in both to-be-sent queue and ack queue.		-1
scribe.async.sender.sleep.millisOptionalThe sleep interval in millis for the async sender who tries to send messages out of  
the to-be-sent queue.		10
audit.enabledOptionalAdd this property to turn audit feature on. By default, audit feature is turned off.false
audit.window.size.secOptionalAt which incoming messages will be bucketed while generating audit stats60
